name: Product Management
description: This module allows users to manage various aspects of products including creation, editing, and removal.

name: Store Orders
description: Store Orders module manages incoming orders, tracking, and processing customer requests.

name: Product Sales
description: Product Sales module tracks sales data, including revenue, quantity sold, and profit margins.

name: Stock Levels
description: Stock Levels module monitors inventory quantities, alerts low stock, and manages restocking.
